description: Manage and configure the digital twin relationships of a Digital Twins instance.

commands.name: az dt twin relationship create
commands.summary: Create a relationship between source and target digital twins.
examples: az dt twin relationship create -n {instance_or_hostname} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --twin-id {source_twin_id} --target {target_twin_id}
az dt twin relationship create -n {instance_or_hostname} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --twin-id {source_twin_id} --target {target_twin_id} --if-none-match

az dt twin relationship create -n {instance_or_hostname} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --twin-id {source_twin_id} --target {target_twin_id} --properties '{"ownershipUser": "me", "ownershipDepartment": "Computer Science"}'

commands.name: az dt twin relationship delete
commands.summary: Delete a digital twin relationship on a Digital Twins instance.

commands.name: az dt twin relationship delete-all
commands.summary: Deletes all digital twin relationships within a Digital Twins instance, including incoming relationships.

commands.name: az dt twin relationship list
commands.summary: List the relationships of a digital twin.
commands.syntax:
az dt twin relationship list --dt-name
                             --source
                             [--incoming {false, true}]
                             [--kind]
                             [--resource-group]
examples: az dt twin relationship list -n {instance_or_hostname} --twin-id {twin_id} --relationship contains
az dt twin relationship list -n {instance_or_hostname} --twin-id {twin_id} --relationship contains --incoming

commands.name: az dt twin relationship show
commands.summary: Show details of a digital twin relationship.

commands.name: az dt twin relationship update
commands.summary: Updates the properties of a relationship between two digital twins via JSON patch specification.
examples: az dt twin relationship update -n {instance_or_hostname} --twin-id {twin_id} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --json-patch '{"op":"replace", "path":"/Temperature", "value": 20.5}'

az dt twin relationship update -n {instance_or_hostname} --twin-id {twin_id} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --json-patch '{"op":"replace", "path":"/Temperature", "value": 20.5}' --etag {etag}
az dt twin relationship update -n {instance_or_hostname} --twin-id {twin_id} --relationship-id {relationship_id} --relationship contains --json-patch ./my/patch/document.json
